name: upgradeIoFilter
description: Upgrade the Rubrik ioFilter for a VMware cluster with a specific ID. The cluster must be in maintenance mode to upgrade the ioFilter successfully. The vCenter of the VMware compute cluster must be of version 6.7 and above.

id.description: ID of the VMware compute cluster.

fqdn.description: Fully qualified domain name where the filter should be hosted for install/upgrade operations.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
